definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The centaurs were invited to Pirithous' wedding as a gesture of goodwill .
sentences.chinese: 为了表示善意，皮里托斯邀请人马参加自己的婚宴。

sentences.english: I only buy my jeans at Goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 我只买我的牛仔裤在善意。

sentences.english: Often we tell them what we call “white lies”.
sentences.chinese: 我们常常会对他们说，这是“善意的谎言”。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, we accept and appreciate the criticism and correction of good-will from STAPLES China.
sentences.chinese: 同时，我们也接受史泰博中国方面的善意批评和指正。

sentences.english: Nothing can rescue person who always distorts others' goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 永远扭曲别人善意的人，无药可救。

sentences.english: I believe the people of the world are kind-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 我相信世界人民是善意的。

sentences.english: We should not deny the abstract nature of juristic acts of real rights due to the bona fide gain system.
sentences.chinese: 不能以善意取得制度否定物权行为的无因性。

sentences.english: Idealism and good intentions are not enough.
sentences.chinese: 理想主义和善意是不够的。

sentences.english: Her kindness, recommended by so pretty a face, was engaging.
sentences.chinese: 她那可爱的脸蛋上浮泛的善意是动人的。

sentences.english: If more Chinese people have their hearts in the right place, life in China would be better.
sentences.chinese: 如果更多的老中有慈心善意，那么生活在中国会更好。

sentences.english: We unite with all those democratic personages who offer us well-intentioned criticisms.
sentences.chinese: 一切善意地向我们提意见的民主人士，我们都要团结。

sentences.english: To research the abstract nature and the system of acquisition in good faith.
sentences.chinese: 第二，探讨物权行为无因性与善意取得制度。

sentences.english: Professor Chiang is very kind in our collaborations.
sentences.chinese: 江教授非常善意和我们合作。

sentences.english: All are the sort of well-meaning and thoughtful films that the Academy likes best.
sentences.chinese: 全部是组委会最喜欢的那种善意的深思熟虑的电影。

sentences.english: The government said this was a gesture of goodwill.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸政府称这是一个善意的姿态。

sentences.english: People against this view argue thata while lie is after all a lie.
sentences.chinese: 反对这一观点的人认为，善意的谎言是一个谎言之后。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
